attributes.additional_details: We, the British electorate, demand an immediate IN/OUT Referendum on the United Kingdom's continued membership of the European Union.  We demand that the Government immediately invokes Article 50 of the Treaty on European Union and that the Referendum be held one month after that.  Furthermore, we wish the referendum to be held on fair terms, so that a majority of OUT votes will suffice and that if that amounts to less than 50% of the electorate vote then an OUT vote shall suffice for enactment.  If an OUT vote is the result, we demand an immediate withdrawal from all EU Treaties, Agreements and membership.  We do not wish to wait for any renegotiation.  Further, we demand that only British Subjects who have been British Subjects for at least five years are entitled to vote, and that those who have been British subjects for less than five years or are EU Nationals only are excluded.

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:

Petition Title: IMMEDIATE EU REFERENDUM

Created by: June Winton

Closing: 30/03/2015
